hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: Your home away from home, wherever your journey takes you

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2025, Mero Ghar began with a simple idea: to create a platform where travelers could find authentic, comfortable homes that feel like their own, no matter where they are in the world.
story.paragraph2: The name "Mero Ghar," which means "My Home" in Nepali, reflects our commitment to providing accommodations that don't just serve as a place to stay, but as a true home during your travels.
story.paragraph3: What started as a small collection of curated properties has grown into a trusted platform connecting thousands of travelers with unique homes across the globe.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.subtitle: We're on a mission to revolutionize the way people experience travel accommodations.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: To connect travelers with comfortable, authentic accommodations that enhance their travel experience, while empowering property owners to share their spaces with the world.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.description: To create a world where every traveler can feel at home anywhere, fostering cultural exchange and authentic connections between hosts and guests across the globe.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These core principles guide everything we do at Mero Ghar.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We believe in real homes, real experiences, and real connections between hosts and guests.

community.title: Community
community.description: We cover a large community of property owners and possible renters moving worldwide scale.

trust.title: Trust & Safety
trust.description: We prioritize the security and comfort of our community through verified listings and secure transactions.

team.title: Meet Our Team

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about Mero Ghar.

booking.title: How do I book a property?
booking.answer: Simply search for your desired location and dates, browse available properties, and click "Book Now" on the one you like. Follow the prompts to complete your booking.

host.title: How do I become a host?
host.answer: Click on "Become a Host" in the navigation menu, create an account if you don't have one, and follow the step-by-step guide to list your property.

support.title: How do I contact customer support?
support.answer: You can reach our customer support team 24/7 via email through our website.

payment.title: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept PayPal payment option for secure transactions.
